Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>You're...<sp:5:0:0>the customer I saw at
<clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>, aren't you?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You know, from when they were talking
about whether to go through with the
<clr:0000>mayoral election <clr:ffff>or not.<sp:0:4:0>It's become something of a hassle.
They're both so stubborn.<sp:0:4:0>I wish they'd clear the air between them
and end this silly quarrel once and for all.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>But that's a moot point now. <sp:5:0:0>I have
<clr:0000>something else on my mind<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>I have to take care of this before the <clr:0000>mayoral
election<clr:ffff> starts!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Oh! You don't mind lending me an ear?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>I won't mince words. <sp:5:0:0>It's about my
husband, <sp:5:0:0>Reede...<sp:0:4:0>That man of mine... <sp:5:0:0>He shuts himself up
<clr:0000>in our shed every night<clr:ffff>. I don't have the
faintest what he's up to.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_00>When I ask, he just says "it's a secret,"
and I can't get another peep out of him.<sp:0:4:0>I hate the idea of snooping on him. Plus,
I think he'd catch me at it right away.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>But I get so worried when I think about
whether whatever he's doing will affect
his chances in the election!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It'll have to be done in the <clr:0000>middle of the
day<clr:ffff> while my husband isn't in. What on
earth is he doing in <clr:0000>our shed<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>I'm not one to snoop around, so it'll have
to be you.<sp:0:4:0>And of course I'll <clr:0000>pay<clr:ffff> you!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Especially if you can figure out how to get
inside that <clr:0000>locked shed<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Hmm...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>He won't get in through the window. It's too
much of a tight fit. Maybe he could dig a <clr:0000>hole<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0>
This is a stumper.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_07:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>And here I was hoping for someone to lend me
an ear. <sp:5:0:0>Well, that's that, I suppose.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>I want to get to the bottom of all this
before the mayoral election.<sp:0:4:0>That's why I was looking for someone like
you to lend me an ear.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>It'll have to be done in the <clr:0000>middle of the
day <clr:ffff>while my husband isn't in. <sp:5:0:0>What on
earth is he doing in <clr:0000>our shed<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>I'm not one to snoop around, so it'll have
to be you.<sp:0:4:0>And of course I'll <clr:0000>pay<clr:ffff> you!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Especially if you can figure out how to get
inside that <clr:0000>locked shed<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Hmm...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>He won't get in through the window. It's too
much of a tight fit. Maybe he could dig a <clr:0000>hole<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0>
This is a stumper.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I was fit to burst if I couldn't find someone
to talk to about this.<sp:0:4:0>Good thing you came along!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I'd like you to enter <clr:0000>our shed<clr:ffff> at <clr:0000>midday<clr:ffff>
when my husband isn't around and see if
you can figure out what he's doing.<sp:0:4:0>I'll <clr:0000>pay<clr:ffff> you for your troubles, of course.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>The only problem I can see is that he
keeps the place locked up tight.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>You'd never fit in through a window, but maybe
you could dig a <clr:0000>hole<clr:ffff> or something? <sp:5:0:0>Well, you'll
figure it out.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>How goes it? <sp:5:0:0>Made any progress on that
thing we talked about?
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm all for getting things out in the open,
but <clr:0000>something's been on my mind<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>I have to take care of this before the
<clr:0000>mayoral election<clr:ffff> starts!
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sad_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hang on. We can't talk here. I'm going somewhere
we won't be overheard.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>You say he's developing a new type of
pumpkin?<sp:0:4:0>So that's why he's been consulting with
Nack so often.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>He could have just asked Cece about it
directly! <sp:5:0:0>But I know he's too hardworking
and stubborn for that.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Thank you for looking into this for me.<sp:5:0:0>
I promised you a reward, and I keep
my promises.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's a relief to find out the truth. A lot of
things make sense now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Like why he went to Ventest Clothing... It's so
obvious in hindsight...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><sp:0:2:2:6400>Ah, I'm sorry. That's between me and
my husband.<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>...At least I would, if you weren't carrying
so much stuff.<sp:0:4:0>I was all set to give you 10 Hylian
tomatoes as thanks too.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, well. Just remember to come back
once you've made some room.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I was all set to give you 10 Hylian
tomatoes as thanks...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Just remember to come back once you've
made some room.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>What a pair the two of them make. If they
would just get along!
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Oh! Looks like you cleared some room for
your reward.<sp:0:4:0>Here it is, then. <sp:5:0:0>Enjoy!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Sorry to eat into your schedule. <sp:5:1:0>They
should be finished setting up for the
mayoral election by now, don't you think?<sp:0:4:0>We should head over and see <clr:0000>Sophie<clr:ffff>.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_00>All my secret plans for saving the village
are in there. <sp:5:0:0>I can't let just anyone inside!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>It'll have to be done in the <clr:0000>middle of the
day<clr:ffff> while my husband isn't in. What on
earth is he doing in <clr:0000>our shed<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>The tricky part will be figuring out how to
get inside that <clr:0000>locked shed<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Hmm...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>He won't get in through a window. It's too
much of a tight fit. Maybe he could dig a <clr:0000>hole<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0>
This is a stumper.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Thank you for looking into this for me.<sp:5:0:0>
Here, why don't you take this in return?<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I should excuse myself.<sp:0:4:0>I have to clean <clr:0000>Princess Zelda's house<clr:ffff>
around midday, and it's getting to be
that time.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I should excuse myself.<sp:0:4:0>I have to finish cleaning <clr:0000>Princess Zelda's
house <clr:ffff>while it's still light out.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I should excuse myself.<sp:0:4:0>I just finished cleaning <clr:0000>Princess Zelda's
house<clr:ffff>, and I'd like to get home soon.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>Of all the... <sp:5:0:0>What are you doing here?!<sp:5:0:0>
This is private property!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900>I don't know what hole you crawled in
from, <sp:5:0:0>but there are sensitive secrets here
that might save our village!<sp:0:4:0>Outsiders should stay outside!
